languages.text: "Это так. Словно кукловод он тянет нити чужих судеб, путает и рвет их. Я же обрезаю нити по велению Неумирающего — аккуратно и в срок. Мне должно остановить Немезита, дабы уберечь твоих подданных от безвременных смертей".

"This is true. Like a puppeteer, he pulls at the threads of other people's destinies, tangling and severing them. When I cut these threads, it is only as the Undying One commands: with timely precision. I must stop Nemesite so that I might save your subjects from premature death."
languages.original_text: "Это так. Словно кукловод он тянет нити чужих судеб, путает и рвет их. Я же обрезаю нити по велению Неумирающего — аккуратно и в срок. Мне должно остановить Немезита, дабы уберечь твоих подданных от безвременных смертей".

traits.locale_text: "This is true. Like a puppeteer, he pulls at the threads of other people's destinies, tangles and tears them. I cut these threads as the Undying One commands, precisely and timely. I must stop Nemesite to save your subjects from a premature demise."

"This is true. Like a puppeteer, he pulls at the threads of other people's destinies, tangles and tears them. I cut these threads as the Undying One commands, precisely and timely. I must stop Nemesite to save your subjects from a premature demise."

"This is true. Like a puppeteer, he pulls at the threads of other people's destinies, tangling and severing them. When I cut these threads, it is only as the Undying One commands: with timely precision. I must stop Nemesite so that I might save your subjects from premature death."

languages.text: "Das ist wahr. Wie ein Marionettenspieler zieht er an den Fäden der Schicksale anderer, verwickelt und trennt sie. Wenn ich diese Fäden trenne, dann nur so, wie es der Todlose befiehlt: schnell und präzise. Ich muss Nemesit aufhalten, um Eure Untertanen vor einem vorzeitigen Tod zu bewahren."
languages.original_text: "This is true. Like a puppeteer, he pulls at the threads of other people's destinies, tangling and severing them. When I cut these threads, it is only as the Undying One commands: with timely precision. I must stop Nemesite so that I might save your subjects from premature death."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist wahr. Wie ein Marionettenspieler zieht er an den Fäden der Schicksale anderer, verwickelt und trennt sie. Wenn ich diese Fäden trenne, dann nur so, wie es der Todlose befiehlt: schnell und präzise. Ich muss Nemesit aufhalten, um Eure Untertanen vor einem vorzeitigen Tod zu bewahren."

languages.text: «Eso es cierto. Es como un titiritero; mueve los hilos de los destinos ajenos, enredándolos y cortándolos a placer. Cuando yo corto esos hilos, obro según la voluntad del Inmortal: con precisión y en el momento adecuado. Debo detener a Nemesitio para salvar a sus súbditos de una muerte prematura».
languages.original_text: "This is true. Like a puppeteer, he pulls at the threads of other people's destinies, tangling and severing them. When I cut these threads, it is only as the Undying One commands: with timely precision. I must stop Nemesite so that I might save your subjects from premature death."

traits.locale_text: «Eso es cierto. Es como un titiritero; mueve los hilos de los destinos ajenos, enredándolos y cortándolos a placer. Cuando yo corto esos hilos, obro según la voluntad del Inmortal: con precisión y en el momento adecuado. Debo detener a Nemesitio para salvar a sus súbditos de una muerte prematura».

languages.text: 「それはそうね。操り人形のように、彼は他人の運命の糸を引っ張り、絡ませ、断ち切る。私がこの糸を切るときは、不死の者が命じられるままにするわ。私がネメサイトを止めることで、あなたの家臣が早死にすることはない」
languages.original_text: "This is true. Like a puppeteer, he pulls at the threads of other people's destinies, tangling and severing them. When I cut these threads, it is only as the Undying One commands: with timely precision. I must stop Nemesite so that I might save your subjects from premature death."

traits.locale_text: 「それはそうね。操り人形のように、彼は他人の運命の糸を引っ張り、絡ませ、断ち切る。私がこの糸を切るときは、不死の者が命じられるままにするわ。私がネメサイトを止めることで、あなたの家臣が早死にすることはない」

languages.text: “确实如此。他就像个木偶师一样，拉扯着其他人命运的丝线，把所有丝线缠在一起，再将它们全都割断。而当我切断这些丝线时，我遵照的是不死之神的旨意，既及时，又精确。我必须阻止涅墨斯特，这样才能拯救你的臣民免于不逢时的死亡。”
languages.original_text: "This is true. Like a puppeteer, he pulls at the threads of other people's destinies, tangling and severing them. When I cut these threads, it is only as the Undying One commands: with timely precision. I must stop Nemesite so that I might save your subjects from premature death."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此。他就像个木偶师一样，拉扯着其他人命运的丝线，把所有丝线缠在一起，再将它们全都割断。而当我切断这些丝线时，我遵照的是不死之神的旨意，既及时，又精确。我必须阻止涅墨斯特，这样才能拯救你的臣民免于不逢时的死亡。”

languages.text: « C'est vrai. Tel un marionnettiste, il tire les ficelles du destin des autres pour mieux les couper et les entremêler. Pour ma part, quand je tranche l'un de ces fils, je ne fais qu'accomplir la volonté de l'Empereur, avec rigueur et ponctualité. Je dois arrêter Némésite afin d'éviter une mort prématurée à vos sujets. »
languages.original_text: "This is true. Like a puppeteer, he pulls at the threads of other people's destinies, tangling and severing them. When I cut these threads, it is only as the Undying One commands: with timely precision. I must stop Nemesite so that I might save your subjects from premature death."

traits.locale_text: « C'est vrai. Tel un marionnettiste, il tire les ficelles du destin des autres pour mieux les couper et les entremêler. Pour ma part, quand je tranche l'un de ces fils, je ne fais qu'accomplir la volonté de l'Empereur, avec rigueur et ponctualité. Je dois arrêter Némésite afin d'éviter une mort prématurée à vos sujets. »

languages.text: "Bu doğru. Tıpkı bir kuklacı gibi diğer insanların kaderlerinin ipliklerini çekiyor, dolaştırıyor ve koparıyor. Ben bu iplikleri kestiğimde bunu Ölmeyen'in emrettiği şekilde, zamanlamalı bir şekilde yapıyorum. Nemezit'i durdurmalıyım ki tebaalarını zamansız bir ölümden kurtarabileyim."
languages.original_text: "This is true. Like a puppeteer, he pulls at the threads of other people's destinies, tangling and severing them. When I cut these threads, it is only as the Undying One commands: with timely precision. I must stop Nemesite so that I might save your subjects from premature death."
